issue.title: [CF 1185] Change profile on specialization change
issue.body:
It would be helpful to be able to separate profiles based on selected specialization. Even though you can do this within the profile itself, it does become a bit cluttered, since you will have to keep separate groups for each specialization in the same profile.

If you would be able to have a setting to change profile based on specialization for that character, it would make it easier in numerous cases:
1. If you have multiple alts of the same class, but you have different specs selected.
2. It's easier to maintain and share profiles with others.
3. The profiles will become smaller and easier to maintain and update.
4. The grouping will be more intuitive

The specialization settings per group works best for small profiles and/or global groups.


> Posted by CurseForge user hiar_nl | Imported from CurseForge issue #1185 | Raw
